thread.title: Chinese down-feather sleeping bags at Manali
thread.title_full: Chinese down-feather sleeping bags at Manali

author: the_blue_bharal
title: Chinese down-feather sleeping bags at Manali
text: Some pretend-place where bluebirds sing and there's a whiskey spring... Posts: # 1 I have heard great things (and also, bad ones) about China-made down-feather sleeping bags that are sold in Manali markets in range of INR 1000. Can someone who have used them confirm if they are genuinely made of down feathers and are extremely warm? Also, any pointers if it's possible to verify on-the-spot whether a bag is actually good quality down feather or something duplicate? Learning to be silent.
